query: query OriginalMovies($movieId: Long!, $moviesLimit: Int!, $isAuthorized: Boolean!) { movie(id: $movieId) { distribution { releases(original: true, types: [DIGITAL], limit: 1) { items { companies { id displayName originalsMovieList { id url movies(supportedItemTypes: [MOVIE_LIST_ITEM], limit: $moviesLimit) { items { movie { ...MovieForPoster __typename } __typename } total __typename } __typename } __typename } __typename } __typename } __typename } __typename } } fragment RatingValue on RatingValue { value isActive count __typename } fragment MovieForPoster on Movie { id title { russian original __typename } poster { avatarsUrl __typename } genres { id name __typename } rating { kinopoisk { ...RatingValue __typename } __typename } userData @include(if: $isAuthorized) { watchStatuses { watched { value __typename } __typename } __typename } viewOption { buttonText isAvailableOnline: isWatchable(filter: {anyDevice: false, anyRegion: false}) purchasabilityStatus contentPackageToBuy { billingFeatureName __typename } type posterWithRightholderLogo __typename } ... on Film { productionYear __typename } ... on Video { productionYear __typename } ... on TvSeries { releaseYears { start end __typename } __typename } ... on TvShow { releaseYears { start end __typename } __typename } ... on MiniSeries { releaseYears { start end __typename } __typename } __typename }
